title: Create model configuration
description: Create src/config/modelConfig.ts with model options. Enable runtime model selection.

title: Create ExerciseDefinition interface
description: Interface with name, positions, idealAngles (Map<string, AngleConfig>), and repCriteria.

title: Add unit tests for SwingRepProcessor rep counting
description: Test rep completion sequence (Release â†’ Top). Test partial cycles. Test reset behavior.

title: Update UI to select exercise type
description: Add exercise selection to the UI

title: Extract SwingAnalyzer from SwingFormProcessor
description: Move position detection logic (detectPosition), ideal angles and thresholds, cycle tracking state. Make it a pure class with no RxJS/video dependencies.

title: Create VideoSkeletonSource
description: Wrap VideoFrameAcquisition + PoseSkeletonTransformer. Emit Observable<SkeletonEvent>.

title: Phase 3: Unified Pipeline Refactor
description: Extract shared analysis logic so both real-time and batch modes use the same code

title: Create analyzer factory
description: Function createAnalyzer(exercise: ExerciseType): ExerciseAnalyzer

title: Add unit tests for SwingFormProcessor position detection
description: Test each position (Top, Connect, Bottom, Release) with known skeleton data. Test threshold boundaries. Test cycle detection logic.

title: Create PoseDetectorFactory
description: Instantiate correct model based on config. Handle different keypoint formats (COCO-17 vs MediaPipe-33).

title: Create exercise-specific analyzers
description: SwingAnalyzer (existing, refactored), PullUpAnalyzer, PistolSquatAnalyzer

title: Update PoseTrackPipeline to use SwingAnalyzer
description: Delete duplicated position detection logic (lines 354-419). Use shared SwingAnalyzer instance.

title: Verify both paths produce identical results
description: Add integration test comparing real-time vs batch analysis.

title: Create keypoint adapter
description: Map MediaPipe keypoints to COCO format (or vice versa). Ensure Skeleton class works with both.

title: Update SwingFormProcessor to use SwingAnalyzer
description: Becomes a thin wrapper that subscribes to skeleton source. Delegates to SwingAnalyzer for analysis.

title: Update PoseSkeletonTransformer for model abstraction
description: Accept model type in constructor. Use factory to create detector.

title: Phase 4: Model Abstraction (BlazePose Support)
description: Support multiple pose detection models (MoveNet, BlazePose)

title: Phase 5: Exercise Abstraction (Pull-ups, Pistol Squats)
description: Support multiple exercises beyond kettlebell swings

title: Create PoseTrackSkeletonSource
description: Take PoseTrackFile as input. Iterate frames, build Skeleton from keypoints. Emit Observable<SkeletonEvent> (fast, not throttled).

title: Add unit tests for PoseTrackPipeline with fixture data
description: Test processAllFrames() returns expected results. Test seeking behavior. Test rep counting accuracy.

title: Phase 2: Unit Tests for Analysis Pipeline
description: Add comprehensive unit tests for the analysis pipeline using hardcoded poseTracks
